Title: The Dark Avengers
Writer: Joshua Johnson (characters), Brandon Slagle (characters), Brandon Slagle (screenplay), Brandon Slagle (story), Remy St. Paul (characters), Remy St. Paul (story), Nick Stough (characters)
Actors: Brandon Slagle, Remy St. Paul, Richard Fort, Brandon Rawlins
Plot: Two years ago Bryan Yuen Sage left one life and entered another, a life among criminals, hunting them and destroying them. It's almost as if fate chose him, and the last thing that he would ever want, if for this fate to choose another.
